page.title: 12GLENCORSE CHURCH,PENICUIK
page.content: The church in our area is Glencorse Parish Church. It is Church of Scotland. Glencorse Parish Church is 100 years old on December 14th 1985. It has 400 members but has seating for 600 people. Roland Anderson was the architect. Inside the church are stained glass windows, a pipe organ and a medieval baptismal font from the old church. The ministers have been Mr. Strong, Mr. Begbie, Dr. Kellas, Mr. Hall and the present minister Mr. James Manson. He is responsible for 3 churches, Roslin, Glencorse and Bilston but he has an assistant, Mr. Alan Hutchison. Outside the church there is a cup and ring stone which is thought to be 8000 to 9000 years old and which came from the site of the previous church. The Church Hall in Milton Bridge was previously a lemonade factory.
